actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on October 14, 2025.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Chair announced the Speaker's designation of the period from Tuesday, October 14, 2025, through Sunday, October 19, 2025, as a "district work period".

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on October 8, 2025, at 3:10 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 254, S. 269, S. 318, S. 1333, S. 2144, and H.J. Res. 104.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on October 10, 2025, at 10:48 a.m.: That the Senate passed H.J. Res. 105 and H.J. Res. 106.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. Lisa Wink Schultz, Office of the Senate Chaplain, Washington DC.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Mike Bost to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
